        Parameters:

        Returns:
        result return a boolean, if the user exist, return false, else, true

        public static boolean drop_table(java.lang.String id)
        This function is going to drop a user table with the user id
        Parameters:
        id - Input the user id to find the corresponding user table
        Returns:
        result Return true if the table found and drop successfully, else return false

      • delete_user

        public static boolean delete_user(java.lang.String id)
        This function is going to delete the user's row from the user list table First to check whether the user's row exist And then delete the corresponding user row
        Parameters:
        id - Input the user id to check whether the row exist and delete the row
        Returns:
        result Return a boolean. If the user id not exist, return false, else if the user id exist and deleted successfully, return true

      • insert_record

        public static boolean insert_record(java.lang.String id,
                                    java.lang.String text,
                                    java.lang.String weight)
        This function is going to insert the record into the user table with food name, user's weight, food's qualities First we will get the current time And we will call food.class to the corresponding nutrition depending on the food name Finally we use all these information to insert a new row in the user table
        Parameters:
        id - Input the user id to get corresponding user's weight and select the user table
        text - Input the food name to get information about the food
        weight - Input the user's weight at the time to insert into the table
        Returns:
        Return a boolean. If all these things done successfully(can find the user table and get the information about the food), it will return true. Else, return false

      • deleteRecord

        public static boolean deleteRecord(java.lang.String id,
                                   java.lang.String text)
        This function is just created for the test case in order to delete the corresponding record we insert through the test case It is not used in the controller
        Parameters:
        id - Input the user id to find the user table
        text - Input the food name to find the corresponding rows in the user table
        Returns:
        result Return a boolean value if all the things done successfully

      • DBsearch_record

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String>> DBsearch_record(java.lang.String id)
        This function is going to search the whole user table It will search the table depending on the date and add the information on the same date together It will return the data in a 2D arraylist with one date added together
        Parameters:
        id - Input the user id to find the user table
        Returns:
        result Return a 2D arraylist(String) with one date of a row and there are five columns(date,weight,energy,sodium,fatty)

      • DBsearch_day

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> DBsearch_day(java.lang.String id,
                                                                 java.lang.String date)
        This function is going the search the data in the user table on a exact given date It will return the data on the given day
        Parameters:
        id - Input the user id to find the user table
        date - Input the date you want to check in the user table
        Returns:
        result Return an Arraylist which include the information on the given date by five values -- date, weight, energy, sodium, and fatty

      • select_userlist

        public static java.lang.String select_userlist(java.lang.String id,
                                               java.lang.String column)
        This function the going to get the data on a given column and a given row in the user list table
        Parameters:
        id - Input the user id to find the corresponding row in the user list
        column - Input the column name to find the column
        Returns:
        result Return a String which is the data found in the given row and column

      • update_userlist

        public static boolean update_userlist(java.lang.String id,
                                      java.lang.String column,
                                      java.lang.String text)
        This function is going to update the information in the user list table It will update the data in the given row and given column
        Parameters:
        id - Input the user id to find the corresponding row in the user list
        column - Input the column name to find the column
        text - Input the text you want to update at the given row and column in the user list
        Returns:
        result Return a boolean value to tell whether update succeeds
